<p><strong>About the Handbook</strong> 

::: {.justify}
<p>Welcome to the webpage of the Handbook of Statistics of Extremes. 
The Handbook brings together leading voices in the extreme value theory 
community to offer a clear and reliable reference for the field.

This webpage outlines the Handbook’s contents and provides supporting online 
materials.

The Handbook is currently with the production team at Chapman & Hall/CRC and is 
expected to be released in mid-2026. 

This page is under construction and will keep being expanded in the coming weeks.
</p>
</div>
:::
